---
id: change-user-password
title: "Change user password"
description: "The API allows user to change their passsword by providing the current and new password. The user must also confirm the new password to ensure accuracy."

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Change user password"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/change-user-password"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API allows user to change their passsword by providing the current and new password. The user must also confirm the new password to ensure accuracy.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<MimeTabs

        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"password"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}

        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"confirm_password"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"0b6f43698f2a8689db117136336716c0","description":"The confirmation of the new password."}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
